content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I was commanded to google customs of different countries and found several links to websites with information on customs around the world. Then, you attempted to get a text summary of the first link, but the command returned an error due to a missing positional argument. However, your computer returned a successful result for the command "get_text_summary" with information on 20 fascinating cultural traditions and customs around the world. The article emphasizes the importance of understanding and respecting cultural traditions when traveling to foreign countries.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The article discusses various customs and traditions from around the world, including giving flowers in Russia, gift-giving in China, avoiding asking for salt in Egypt, punctuality norms in different countries, table manners in Norway, gift-giving in the Netherlands and China, birthday traditions in various countries, and cultural greetings in different countries. The article emphasizes the importance of understanding and respecting cultural traditions when traveling to foreign countries. \n \n Links: ['\\n  (https://www.daytranslations.com/blog/20-traditions-around-the-world/)', '\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n (https://www.daytranslations.com)', '\\n  (javascript:void(0))', 'Home (https://www.daytranslations.com/blog/)', 'Topics (https://www.daytranslations.com/blog/topics/)']"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "get_text_summary", "args": {"url": "https://theculturetrip.com/north-america/usa/articles/12-surprising-customs-from-around-the-world/", "question": "What are some of the customs and traditions mentioned in the article?"}}}'}]
"""
